thread.title: Jamaica's Marlon James wins Booker Prize for fiction
thread.title_full: Jamaica's Marlon James wins Booker Prize for fiction

title: Jamaica's Marlon James wins Booker Prize for fiction
text:
> Entertainment Jamaica's Marlon James wins Booker Prize for fiction Britain's Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall, delivers a speech at the ceremony ahead of the announcement of the winner for the Man Booker Prize for Fiction 2015 in London, Tuesday Oct. 13, 2015. Sticking with tradition six authors are shortl isted for the 50,000 pounds (dlrs 76,000 US) prize. (Neil Hall/pool via AP) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team!
